rows.label: campfev11_500_100_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, you could rest up at Hyber Village
today instead of camping. Did you think
of that?

rows.label: campfev11_500_100_msg0002
rows.name:
I mean, I know how much you like
stinky, damp, flea-ridden tents. But
it'd make a nice change.

rows.label: campfev11_500_100_msg0003
rows.name:
Haha..
Isn't it always the case, Minochi?

rows.label: campfev11_500_100_msg0004
rows.name:
If you plan to journey in comfort,
then disappointment is sure to join
your entourage.

rows.label: campfev11_500_100_msg0005
rows.name:
Yeah, that's probably true for the likes
of me. But there's no need for you to
be roughing it out here, Your Majesty.

rows.label: campfev11_500_100_msg0006
rows.name:
Adel is my comrade in arms. We
have two hearts, but one goal.

rows.label: campfev11_500_100_msg0008
rows.name:
Simple, and strong. Enough to bind our
friendship, like a rope weft from a stout
and common plant.

rows.label: campfev11_500_100_msg0009
rows.name:
But you and I are no less tightly bound
are we not, Minochi?
